title: Bezier Clock

descriptionHTML:
Watch face for your Android Wear device based on Bézier Clock by Jack Frigaard (http://jackf.net/bezier-clock/). Also you can put it on your phone and use as live wallpaper

Digital clock numbers are represented as combinations of Bezier curves with smooth transition animation.

Icon for project was provided by https://www.designcontest.com
